abstracts.cdata!:
The project's main objectives are
            to: (a) assist in the development of Kosovo - the least
            developed region in Yugoslavia - through increases in
            productivity, employment, and income in the social and
            individual farm sectors; (b) increase production of
            livestock, wine, fruits, nuts, milk and cheese and processed
            food products primarily for the domestic market; (c) advance
            planning of small-scale irrigation development through
            groundwater studies; (d) contribute to institution building
            by strengthening the capabilities of the regional
            development institutions. The project objectives will be
            achieved primarily by providing finance for: (a) increasing
            processing capacities to ensure adequate and steady markets
            for agricultural products from the project area; and (b)
            livestock and horticultural production in both the social
            and individual sectors.
